Title: Zmaga ali kako je Maks Bigec zasukal kolo zgodovine
Actors: Jurij Drevensek, Mojca Funkl, Branko Jordan, Iva Krajnc
Plot: Worker Maks Bigec decides to take things in his own hands when he hears that his factory will be closed. He takes the factory director as a hostage and demands that the state should reopen the factory.
